name: Mobile Developer at a booking platform
description:
Mobile Developer at a booking platform
This is an on-site position in Bangkok, Thailand.
Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance are provided.

Our teams work on the full stack and build end-to-end systems including user interfaces, APIs, backend systems, and database systems. Our products are always evolving and under experimentation. We accomplish this by having an amazing degree of automation, CI/CD systems, and use a modularized approach.

What you will get:
• A competitive salary which corresponds to your skills and knowledge
• Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance for you and your dependents
• Medical insurance (two plans to choose from)
• Other social benefits (various leaves, assistance program, parking subsidy, staff discount etc.)

What you will do:
• Develop features, experiments, technical projects and complex systems
• Learn additional mobile team related software platforms and related technologies such as Android and API Servers/GraphQL
• Continue to evolve our architecture and build better software
• Be a major contributor to our agile and scrum practices
• Get involved with full stack engineering and collaborate with server, other client, and infrastructure technical team members

What you'll need to succeed:
• At least 3 years of experience developing mobile applications; 5 years preferred
• B.S. in Computer Science or quantitative field; M.S. preferred
• Working experience with agile, analytics, A/B testing, GIT Flow
• Extremely proficient in one or more mobile platforms (iOS, Android, Web) and at least one programming language (Swift, Objective C, Kotlin, JavaScript, Java, Scala, C#)
• To have a good command of the English language
Also great to have:
• Experience in multiple platforms including iOS, Android, Web, and API services
• Experience working on an app or internet company with large numbers of users and transactions per second
• Have experience in a data driven company with experience analyzing and working with Big Data
